publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3772<> Mr David Davidson: SCDI Oil and Gas Survey—That the Parliament welcomes the latest Survey of International Activity in the Oil and Gas Sector, prepared by the Scottish Council for Development and Industry (SCDI); welcomes the fact that total oil and gas supply chain sales from Scotland have exceeded £10 billion for the first time, and, in light of the report’s findings, notes the enormous importance of the oil and gas industry to the Scottish economy in general and to the economy of the north east in particular. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Margaret Mitchell*, Richard Lochhead*, Derek Brownlee*, Mike Rumbles*, Murdo Fraser*
S2M-3772<> SCDI Oil and Gas Survey (lodged on 22 December 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Phil Gallie*, Mary Scanlon*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
